subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: In the Metro Atlantic Athletic Conference semifinals, Fairfield, ranked fourth in the conference, beat No. 1 Iona, to move into the title game against Loyola (Md.), which beat Siena.
snippet: In the Metro Atlantic Athletic Conference semifinals, Fairfield, ranked fourth in the conference, beat No. 1 Iona, to move into the title game against Loyola (Md.), which beat Siena.
